Metadata.title: Full Stack Developer
Metadata.description: Specializing in React and Next.js, I utilize advanced technologies to create dynamic and engaging web applications. Available for hire on-site or remote. English, French. See my dev works. Download CV.

Hero.p5: Specializing in React and Next.js, I utilize advanced technologies to create dynamic and engaging web applications.

AboutMe.p1: Full Stack Developer with over 2 years of experience.
AboutMe.p3: Professional Title: Web and Mobile Web Developer Level 5 (equivalent to a diploma at the level of a two-year undergraduate degree) registered in the RNCP under number 37674.
AboutMe.p5: I am constantly working on learning new technologies and improving my skills.
AboutMe.p7: I enjoy working with other developers and designers to create the best possible product. I am always open to new ideas and suggestions.
AboutMe.p8: Strong JavaScript knowledge and advanced web development.
AboutMe.p9: Building fast React App's and websites.
AboutMe.p10: Fast client-side and Server-side Rendering with Client and Server Components. Further optimized with Static and Dynamic Rendering on the server.
AboutMe.p11: Tailwind CSS lets me build custom, responsive designs faster with its utility-first approach and pre-defined classes..
AboutMe.p12: Using PostgreSQL for scalable databases on the backend.
AboutMe.p13: Next-generation Node.js and TypeScript ORM that unlocks a new level of developer experience when working with databases.
AboutMe.p14: Enables efficient, scalable server-side applications with its non-blocking, event-driven architecture.
AboutMe.p15: Streamlines Node.js web application development with its minimal, flexible framework and robust set of features.
